Master Answer:
Our tips for locating immunization records are here. You can find the contact information for the Langley health unit here. In BC, Hepatitis B vaccine is offered in grade 6. Hepatitis A is not part of the routine school program and there is no vaccine for Hepatitis C.
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: My son was vaccinated in  high school for HEP a/b/c - CAN I get his records from Langely health unit.
